content:
Good day to all and thank you to let me jump in this network. I'm currently working in AI field and I'd like to share with you some thoughts about that: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/becoming-ai-project-manager-stefano-ravegnani/
Best Regards
Stefano

Becoming an AI Project Manager
“I work as Project Manager” “Oh really, and what do you do?” This could be a typical conversation between me and my family or friends because Project Manager is a role that many people does not comprehend while saying “I’m a Java developer” everyone figures out what are you doing and why.
